bibl.title: with contributions by A. BENAISSA, D. COLOMO, M. COTTIER, M. GERHARDT, R. HATZILAMBROU, N. LITINAS, D. MANETTI, H. MAENO, P.M. PINTO, P. RIPAT, M. SATAMA, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXIV (Nos 4968-5019). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 95.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXIV, 4968-5019. - I. New Testament (4968). - II. Medical and Related Texts (4969-4979). - III. Documentary Texts (4980-5019).

LEITH D., D.C. PARKER, S.R. PICKERING and N. GONIS, M. MALOUTA, with contributions by A. BENAISSA, D. COLOMO, M. COTTIER, M. GERHARDT, R. HATZILAMBROU, N. LITINAS, D. MANETTI, H. MAENO, P.M. PINTO, P. RIPAT, M. SATAMA, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXIV (Nos 4968-5019). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 95.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2009, 8°, xii-174 pp., tabl. et 8 pll. ISBN 978-0-85698-183-8. £65.
Leith Parker Pickering Gonis Malouta Benaissa Colomo Cottier Gerhardt Hatzilambrou Litinas Manetti Maeno Pinto Ripat Satama
